PHRASE.LANG:

 This bundle contains:

 (2) Plastic Soldier - Outfit - Modern (Women)
 (3) Plastic Soldier - Rifle - Crouching

 ・This locomotion object will boost your speed. Speed = 5.25m/s

 ・This locomotion object will boost your speed. Speed = 5.25m/s
 (6) Plastic Soldier - Bazooka - Crouching
 ・This locomotion object will boost your speed. Speed = 5.25m/s
 [#Legal]
